title: Looking for Gold top laner for regular flex team
body:
Our team is currently looking for a top lane to join us for flex games on a regular basis.
we are currently all gold in solo/duo, however we have one silver for flex, so we can only accept gold/silver flex ranking applicants.
we currently plan to play from 6:30pm - 10:30pm AEST monday wednesday and friday, with weekends based on availability.

It is expected that applicants be able to accept constructive criticisms, as well as be willing to learn additional champions should the need arise (sorry, no one tricks)
A working microphone and willingness to communicate during game is also expected, as we will be using discord during games.

for more information or to apply, add either myself (Zami) or Shiney
